ai-thag13.1:1.1_0: He who was special in the kingdom,
ai-thag13.1:1.2_0: the footman to the king of Aṅga,
ai-thag13.1:1.3_0: today is special in the Dhamma—
ai-thag13.1:2.1_0: Five to cut, five to drop,
ai-thag13.1:2.4_0: is called “One who has crossed the flood”.
ai-thag13.1:3.1_0: If a monk is insolent and negligent,
ai-thag13.1:4.3_0: If a monk is insolent and negligent,
ai-thag13.1:5.1_0: Those whose words are well implemented,
ai-thag13.1:5.2_0: are constantly mindful of the body.
ai-thag13.1:6.1_0: The straight path has been explained—
ai-thag13.1:6.2_0: go on it and don’t turn back.
ai-thag13.1:7.2_0: the Teacher supreme in the world,
ai-thag13.1:7.3_0: created the simile of the lute for me.
ai-thag13.1:8.2_0: for the attainment of the highest goal.
ai-thag13.1:9.2_0: And to seclusion of the mind,
ai-thag13.1:9.3_0: For the one committed to harmlessness
ai-thag13.1:9.4_0: And to the end of grasping,
ai-thag13.1:10.1_0: For the one committed to the end of craving
ai-thag13.1:10.2_0: And to non-confusion of the mind,
ai-thag13.1:10.3_0: Having seen the arising of the senses,
ai-thag13.1:11.1_0: To that poised one, rightly freed
ai-thag13.1:11.2_0: who has cut off craving for continued existence,
ai-thag13.1:11.3_0: There is nothing more to add
ai-thag13.1:11.4_0: And nothing that needs to be done.
ai-thag13.1:12.1_0: Just as a single solid rock,
ai-thag13.1:12.3_0: So too, all visual objects, and sounds,
ai-thag13.1:13.1_0: And mental objects, good and bad,
ai-thag13.1:13.3_0: Their mind is steady and unfettered
ai-thag13.1:13.7_0: The Book of the Thirties is finished.
ai-thag13.1:14.0_0: The account of the thirty-six streams
ai-thag13.1:14.3_0: The Sayings of the virtuous is reborn
